subject: 回复：Fwd: Collaboration Proposal – Gaga Racing x Simsonn
description_text:
Hi，Gaga Racing ：



Thanks for your interest in our products . 


Could you please provide me your address .  


Best wishes 


Jenny Zhang​


                    

service@simsonn.com<service@simsonn.com> 在 2025年6月16日 周一 11:48 写道：

 请查看Gaga Racing (gaetankurzawa@gmail.com) 提出的第 13 号票。 
 


                         On             Sat, 14 Jun at 12:16 PM             ,  Gaga Racing <gaetankurzawa@gmail.com>  wrote:             Hi,

 Thank you for getting back to me!
 

 I’d be very interested in testing the Simsonn Pro X Ultra Sim Racing Pedal with Haptic Reactor.
 

 My goal would be to create a full in-depth review for my YouTube channel Gaga Racing.
 

 A long-term driving review and my honest feedback.
 

 Promotion of your product to the French-speaking sim racing community, which is currently very engaged and seeking high-performance but affordable gear.
 

 

 Let me know if you need any additional information — and thank you again for considering this collaboration!
 

 Best regards,
 Gaëtan Kurzawa
 ? YouTube – Gaga Racing
 ? gaetankurzawa@gmail.com 
 
 
 Le sam. 14 juin 2025, 06:08, service@simsonn.com <service@simsonn.com> a écrit :
 
  	  Hi，Gaga Racing，

 
 Which samples do you need? Please send me your specific requirements, and I’ll forward them to our team for follow-up.
  

 
 


                                                         On                             Fri, 13 Jun at  3:20 AM                             ,  Gaga Racing <gaetankurzawa@gmail.com>  wrote:                              Hi,
 I hope you're doing well.
 I wanted to kindly follow up on our recent exchange regarding the potential collaboration. I shared my shipping information as requested, and I remain very enthusiastic about the opportunity to test and showcase your product on my YouTube channel, Gaga Racing.
 Let me know if your team had time to discuss the sample request, and if there's anything else I can provide to help with the decision.
 Looking forward to your response!
 Best regards,
 Gaëtan Kurzawa
 Gaga Racing
 ? gaetankurzawa@gmail.com
 ? YouTube – Gaga Racing
 ? 2 allée des Acacias, 94000 Créteil, France
 ? +33 6 19 31 95 76
 
 
 Le jeu. 5 juin 2025 à 09:29, Gaetan Kurzawa <gaetankurzawa@gmail.com> a écrit :
 
   Hi,
 Thank you for your message.
 I look forward to hearing back from you after your internal discussions. In the meantime, here is my shipping address as requested:
  Gaëtan Kurzawa
 2 allée des Acacias
 94000 Créteil
 France
 ? +33 6 19 31 95 76 
 Please let me know if you need any additional information.
 Best regards,
 Gaëtan Kurzawa
 Gaga Racing
 ? gaetankurzawa@gmail.com
 ? YouTube: @gaga_racing 
 
 
 Le jeu. 5 juin 2025 à 09:26, service@simsonn.com <service@simsonn.com> a écrit :
 
  	  你好，Gaga Racing，

感谢您的信息。我们会在沟通后尽快回复您。在此期间，请随时提供您的收货地址。 

 
 


                                                         On                             Thu, 5 Jun at  3:17 AM                             ,  Gaga Racing <gaetankurzawa@gmail.com>  wrote:                              Hi,
 Thank you for getting back to me.
 To answer your question, I currently collaborate mainly with resellers across Europe, as I’m actively expanding my network to gain easier and more consistent access to sim racing hardware for review purposes.
 For example, I’ve been able to get equipment from Simagic through Simhub.pro, with whom I have an ongoing partnership.
 In May alone, this collaboration resulted in:
 
 38 completed orders
 

 Over €11,000 in sales 
 

 With €652.86 in commissions generated from my referral code
 

 A 10% conversion rate from referrals
 
 I also work with Simube, where my audience has generated 34 sales totaling $2,469.36 in revenue (not commissions) so far.
 Currently, I’m also in discussions with VNM and Conspit to test more budget-friendly and efficient sim racing products. This type of gear tends to resonate strongly with my audience, who are always on the lookout for affordable and well-performing solutions.
 Let me know if you'd like any additional data or insights. Thanks again for your consideration, and I hope we can work together!
 Best regards,
 Gaëtan Kurzawa
 Gaga Racing
 ? gaetankurzawa@gmail.com
 ? YouTube: @gaga_racing 
 
 
 Le jeu. 5 juin 2025 à 09:05, service@simsonn.com <service@simsonn.com> a écrit :
 
  	 Hi Gaga Racing,

Alright, I’ll discuss with my team whether we can provide a sample. Could you please share which brands you’re currently working with, and how their exposure and sales performance have been? 

 
 


                                                         On                             Tue, 3 Jun at  7:40 PM                             ,  Gaga Racing <gaetankurzawa@gmail.com>  wrote:                              Dear Simsonn Team,
 My name is Gaëtan Kurzawa, and I am the creator of Gaga Racing, a French-language YouTube channel dedicated to sim racing hardware and immersive racing experiences.
 I’ve been actively involved in the sim racing community for nearly two years, and I’ve built a channel focused on authentic product reviews, setup showcases, and hands-on content tailored to the needs of the growing French-speaking sim racing community.
 
 
? About Gaga Racing
 
 1,300+ subscribers
 

 150,000+ total views
 

 9,500+ monthly views
 

 1 video published every week
 

 Audience: French-speaking sim racers (ages 25–44)
 

 YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@gaga_racing 
 
 
 
? Why I’m Reaching Out
 I’ve been following Simsonn’s range of products—especially your Pro X and Plus X pedals, shifters, and steering wheels—with great interest. Your mission to deliver professional-level gear at accessible prices truly resonates with the sim racing community.
 I would love to collaborate by reviewing one or more of your products on my channel. My videos provide in-depth, real-world testing, with transparent and honest impressions. Content is in French with optional English subtitles, helping you reach a new segment of sim racers.
 
 
✅ What I Can Offer
 
 A dedicated review video on YouTube
 

 Short-form content on Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube Shorts 
 

 Optional affiliate links or discount code to drive engagement
 

 Increased brand awareness in the French-speaking sim racing market
 
 
 
? What I Would Request
 
 A review sample or loan of one or more products (e.g. pedals, steering wheel, or accessories)
 

 Freedom to test and share honest feedback 
 

 Optional: affiliate/partnership opportunities
 
 I would be delighted to showcase Simsonn’s hardware and help grow your visibility in the French market. Please let me know if you’d be open to discussing this further.
 Thank you for your time and consideration.
 Best regards,
 Gaëtan Kurzawa
 ? gaetankurzawa@gmail.com
 ? youtube.com/@gaga_racing
